histogram.name: Borealis.Audio.UsedPath.{Direction}
histogram.summary: Record the usage of each audio path. The value will be incremented if the path is open during the check period, which is once every 5 minutes, when Borealis VM is running.

histogram.name: Borealis.Audio.UsedSubdevices
histogram.summary: The number of audio subdevices that are used by games that are running on proton. This is recorded periodically when the game is running.

histogram.name: Borealis.Audio.Xrun.Alsa.Output
histogram.summary: The number of xrun occurences during playback with ALSA device. This is recorded periodically when the game is running.

histogram.name: Borealis.Disk.HighestDirtyPagesDaily
histogram.summary: The highest dirty page value observed in Borealis that day (taken from`/proc/meminfo`). Reported daily.

histogram.name: Borealis.Disk.InodeRatioAtStartup
histogram.summary: The amount of bytes used per an inode, on average, in Borealis. This is recorded once during each startup, when maitred emits disk related metrics.

histogram.name: Borealis.Disk.StatefulReadsDaily
histogram.summary: Borealis stateful KiB read per day. Reported daily.

histogram.name: Borealis.Disk.StatefulWritesDaily
histogram.summary: Borealis stateful KiB written per day. Reported daily.

histogram.name: Borealis.Disk.SwapReadsDaily
histogram.summary: Borealis swap file KiB read per day. Reported daily.

histogram.name: Borealis.Disk.SwapWritesDaily
histogram.summary: Borealis swap file KiB written per day. Reported daily.

histogram.name: Borealis.Disk.VMUsageToTotalSpacePercentageAtStartup
histogram.summary: The percent of space that the VM is using in comparison to the total size of the disk (i.e VM_usage/total_disk_size). This is recorded once during each startup, when maitred emits disk related metrics.

histogram.name: Borealis.Disk.VMUsageToTotalUsagePercentageAtStartup
histogram.summary: The percent of space that the VM is using in comparison to the total amount of space being used (i.e VM_usage/total_usage). This is recorded once during each startup, when maitred emits disk related metrics.

histogram.name: Borealis.EngagementTime.{Variant}
histogram.summary: {Variant} Engagement time metrics, along with foreground and background time, are only collected on users with Borealis enabled. All four metrics are accumulated and recorded to UMA once a day.

variant.name: Background
variant.summary: Times when a user is engaged and Borealis apps are running in the background, but the user isn't focusing on an Borealis app window.

variant.name: BorealisTotal
variant.summary: Total of Borealis.EngagementTime.Background and .Foreground, which is the time the user is engaged and Borealis is running either in the foreground or background.

variant.name: Foreground
variant.summary: Times when a user is engaged and focuses on a Borealis GUI window.

variant.name: Total
variant.summary: Total engagement time (including when Borealis isn't running).

histogram.name: Borealis.Install.NumAttempts
histogram.summary: The number of Borealis installation attempts. This is recorded each time a user tries to install Borealis. Specifically, this metric is recorded when a user clicks on the install or retry button in the Borealis installer. It is intended that this metric is compared against the sum of Borealis.Install.Result as a way to measure silent failures.

histogram.name: Borealis.Install.OverallTime
histogram.summary:
Time taken for a successful installation. An install starts when the "install" or "retry" installer buttons are clicked and ends when the install completes successfully, at which point this metric is recorded. Note that retries are considered as their own individual installation attempts.
Deprecated; prefer Borealis.Install.OverallTime2.

histogram.name: Borealis.Install.OverallTime2
histogram.summary:
Time taken for a successful installation. An install starts when the "install" or "retry" installer buttons are clicked and ends when the install completes successfully, at which point this metric is recorded. Note that retries are considered as their own individual installation attempts.
(Same as Borealis.Install.OverallTime but with larger bucket sizes.)

histogram.name: Borealis.Install.Result
histogram.summary: The installation result, for example, a successful install, a cancelled install, or an error. This is recorded after an installation attempt has ended.

histogram.name: Borealis.Shutdown.Attempt
histogram.summary: Recording every attempt to exit Borealis given the that VM was launched. Recorded regardless of if the shutdown is successful.

histogram.name: Borealis.Stability
histogram.summary: A record of post-startup failures in Borealis components. Buckets are recorded to when we become aware that the corresponding component has failed.

histogram.name: Borealis.Startup.fsckResult
histogram.summary: Return code from running fsck during VM startup. This is recorded once during each startup, when maitred emits disk related metrics.

histogram.name: Borealis.Startup.fsckTime
histogram.summary: The time taken for fsck to complete during VM startup. This is recorded once during each startup, when maitred emits disk related metrics.

histogram.name: Borealis.Startup.NumAttempts
histogram.summary: Recording every attempt to start Borealis (via the UI).

histogram.name: Borealis.Startup.OverallTime
histogram.summary: Recording the time taken for each successful attempt to start Borealis (via the UI). Deprecated; prefer Borealis.Startup.OverallTime2.

histogram.name: Borealis.Startup.OverallTime2
histogram.summary:
Recording the time taken for each successful attempt to start Borealis (via the UI).
(Same as Borealis.Startup.OverallTime but with larger bucket sizes.)

histogram.name: Borealis.Startup.Result
histogram.summary: Recording the result of each attempt to start Borealis, whether it was successful or the error that it faced.
